segments.text: Is this the right counter for gloves ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , madam . What sort of gloves do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me see some of each .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . What size do you take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Six and a quarter , I believe , but you'd better measure my hand to make sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think a six is your size . How do you like these ? I can recommend them , they're very reliable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well , I'll take these two .
segments.speaker: S2
